mapper.select: SELECT child.id,child.end_time,pay_cash_num+other_pay_num as cash ,room_rate+other_rate+free_rate_num as total , oder.check_type FROM `hm_order_child` child INNER JOIN hm_order oder ON oder.id=child.order_id WHERE (order_state='admissions' OR order_state='notpay' ) AND room_id=#{roomId} ORDER BY child.end_time DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT type.id,type.room_type_name roomType ,COUNT(room.id) count FROM hm_room_type type LEFT JOIN hm_room room ON type.id=room.room_type_id AND room.hotel_id=#{hotelId} AND room.show='yes' GROUP BY type.id
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hm_room WHERE room_major_state=#{state} AND hotel_id=#{hotelId}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hm_room WHERE room_state='yes' AND hotel_id=#{hotelId}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM hm_room WHERE lock_room_state='yes' AND hotel_id=#{hotelId}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM `hm_order_child` WHERE start_time <= #{endTime} AND end_time > #{startTime} AND order_state='reservation'
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM `hm_order_child` WHERE order_state='admissions' AND end_time BETWEEN #{ startTime} AND #{endTime}
